glossary.title: Abbreviations
glossary.p: MS, Murashige and Skoog; Reb A, rebaudioside A; ST, stevioside; DPPH, 2,2-diphenyl-1-picryl hydrazyl; HPLC, high performance liquid chromatography; TPC, total phenolic content; TFC, total flavonoid content; TAC, total antioxidant capacity; TRP, total reducing power; DMSO, dimethyl sulphoxide; ROS, reactive oxygen species.
